author: malinga
title: BIMT launches Management Skills Development Programme
text:
BIMT Campus, recently launched their Management Skills Development Programme with the collaboration of Chartered Managemnet Institute of UK.
It is a management skills development programme aimed to systematically enhance the capabilities and effectiveness of individuals in leadership and managerial roles. The programme equips participants with a broad perspective of their role in a developing economy, preparing them to maximise their impact in business, finance, industry, and commerce.
“It was a milestone achieved with the BIMT Campus where the future students will be benefited. I am really delighted to announce the collaboration with BIMT since they thrive to be a prominent educational provider in Sri Lanka. With the collaboration, students will be benefited to acquire a world class degree programme where they have a very practical approach,” Chief Guest Zain Munir Head of International, CMI UK Representative stated.
“Our key pillars of success are Quality, Student and Lecturers. I am extremely happy to announce this collaboration with CMI UK and the benefits of what the students will receive is going to be value for money.I believe that the backbone of Sri Lankan economy is based on SMEs and Sri Lanka is looking for great business leaders to emerge where they need to be empowered with best management practices,” CEO of BIMT Campus Farshath Jamal stated.
The occasion was also graced by Khamya Perera Current President of CMI Sri Lanka where she spoke about the importance of corporate leadership to elevate Sri Lankan economy, industry veterans in the caliber Ravi Jayawardena Group CEO of Maliban Biscuits Manufactories Pvt Ltd where he touched on the role of a corporate leader in the manufacturing industry and in line to the CMI UK leadership programme by Dr.Tharindu Atapattu Director/Chief Executive Officer, Swisstek Aluminum Ltd, Lanka Swisstek Pvt Ltd.
BIMT Campus was established to provide opportunities for acquiring the right knowledge in management and technology, in collaboration with a prominent international organisation. Their aim is to offer high-standard education that is affordable for students who are eager to learn, positioning their selves as a leading tertiary education provider in Sri Lanka.
